column5: Our International Management course is designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills to enable you to manage and lead in private, voluntary and public domains. It has a specific focus on managing businesses on a global scale and will help you to develop an understanding of practices from around the world. You will be exposed to live case studies to allow you to gain an appreciation of real business contexts. You will also be encouraged to develop your skills and competencies as managers throughout the course and to apply your knowledge in a final, business related research project. Employability is a key aspect of the course and you will be given the opportunity to customise your degree according to your individual career goals.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
